item.title: Red Team Operator (CRTO) Guide | CRTO Review
item.description: Introduction If you are here means either you are thinking to enroll in Red Team Ops (CRTO) Course or already enrolled in the course. Before proceeding further with the review i will request to once go through the faq’s on the course website. If you have already done that we can start the blog … Few weeks ago i passed Certified Red Team Operator (CRTO) Exam with 8/8 Flags which took me about 11 hours.
